content.prompt: An object of unknown mass is swung in a vertical circle at the end of a light string, as seen in the figure above. A measurement is made of the object’s tangential speed at the bottom circular path. A student must determine the tension in the string at the bottom of the circular path. Which of the following measurements, in conjunction with the object’s tangential speed, are required to determine the tension in the string? Select two answers.

choices.label: The object’s tangential speed at the top of the circle
The diameter of the circular path
The time required for the object to complete one revolution

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
